DOC.brief_summary: This study shall determine whether XAPPORT - a mobile device app based on different guidelines, the summary of product characteristics of rivaroxaban, and clinical facts and practice - provides adequate guidance to physicians attending patients undergoing elective surgery, who have to interrupt treatment with rivaroxaban for surgery, in deciding how to approach the pre- and postoperative management of anticoagulation.
DOC.brief_title: Verification of XAPPORT: a Decision Support App for Physicians Used for Patients Anticoagulated With Rivaroxaban in Terms of Anticoagulation Management in Elective Surgery: Verification Process of Medical Decision Algorithm
